ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Elfson DragonSlayer
ygData.msgSnippet: Woot!  Way to go!  Nice one!! I will always remember my first Nagafen - it was New Year s Eve 99 - we won =) I may have gotten my Selo s Drums that night - or
ygData.messageBody:
Woot! Way to go! Nice one!!

I will always remember my first Nagafen - it was New Year's Eve '99 - we won
=) I may have gotten my Selo's Drums that night - or perhaps sometime after.
I fell in the lava 2 times. First time fell off the big ramp and clutched
to the wall while they killed some fire giants. I yelled for help and was
amazed to see one of our rangers jump in and swimm in the lava to come get
me. My previous lava experience had been in Sol-A (15 levels lower) where I
died very fast. He showed me how to swim out. A bit later, I fell in again
and swam out myself. Several Naggy runs later, Naggy fell in the lava and
we had to jump in to finish him off! Someone also dove in and looted him
under-lava!

So grats! Nice to see you enjoy a really fun part!!

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Minstrel, somewhere on Innoruuk



-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 11:24 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Elfson DragonSlayer


Well I was bored last night, playing my warrior twink (I will only play
Elfson with guildies and for big raids now that he is 47), and I get a tell
that a group has cleared the fire giants but has decided they are a bit weak
to drop Naggy, so "How fast can you get your blue butt up to SolB?"

Woohoo! My first dragon run!

They were pretty experienced at this, so things went very smoothly (one
melee group bit it when their bard went down), and he dropped very quickly
(or so it seemed to me). I was in the xp group, which is a nice bonus...

He even dropped his drum, which was given (deservedly so) to ther other bard
there who had been on several Naggy raids in the past.

My original EQ goal has been accomplished!
